FragilityCurve.Description: Cast in place concrete stair, no seismic interstory drift joint
FragilityCurve.Name: Monolithic cast-in-place and precast concrete stairs with no seismic joints - replace with prefabricated steel stair if replacement is required.
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given

DamageState.Description: Local concrete cracking, localized concrete spalling

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Protect surrounding space, epoxy inject cracks, repair finishes. Modify or relocate mechanical and electrical as required for repair work.
Protect floor, cut out damaged areas, repair buckled rebar, patch / cast concrete, repair finishes. Modify or relocate mechanical and electrical as required for repair work.
